{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.04178v1", "title": "Transfinite (almost isometric) ideals in Banach spaces", "summary": "We present and study some transfinite versions of (almost isometric) ideals
in Banach spaces. As these notions are closely related with Lindenstrauss and
Gurari\u{\i} spaces respectively, we will present a similar characterization
for transfinite injective spaces and spaces of (almost) universal disposition
in terms of these transfinite ideals. Furthermore, we construct several
examples outside these type of Banach spaces and make a revision of some
classical results for transfinite ideals.", "main_category": "math.FA", "categories": "math.FA", "published": "2025-05-07T07:15:26Z"}
